name: 5AM
description:
The game starts with the player finding themselves in bedroom full of thoughts, listening to the birds and pigeons from outside . The player can explore the room and the dense texts, go outside and explore the urban landscape, trying to cope with insomnia. There are 2 buttons to be developed: the one that makes you go back to bed and the other one that mutes your brain that makes all the text disappear for 7 sec and lets you focus on your experience of the early morning atmosphere.

[the game is still in progress]
